article_title: EBRD Suffers Losses on Investments on Ukraine, Russia
article_text:
Conflict in eastern Ukraine and Russia’s economic slowdown left the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development with losses on its investments in 2014, but it said it would continue to support the 34 countries in which it operates “in the face of persistent economic challenges.”

The EBRD was established in 1991 to help once Communist countries in Eastern Europe and the former Soviet Union make the transition from centrally...
